name: Impaling Shards
description: Conjure icy shards around you to skewer enemies in the area, dealing 494 Frost Damage every 1 second for 12 seconds.  Enemies hit are overcome with bitter cold, reducing their Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.  Damage done is based on your Max Health, and has a higher chance to apply the Chilled status effect.

Enemies hit are overcome with bitter cold, reducing their Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.  Damage done is based on your Max Health, and has a higher chance to apply the Chilled status effect.
